title: Old diaries, 1881-1901 /
author: Gower, Ronald Sutherland
snippet: Ifound his carriage at Micheldever Station, from whichStratton is a couple of miles. The house is not handsomeexternally, but most liveable within, and full of pictures,although the principal part of the collection is in HamiltonPlace. I found Lord Northbrook alone, with the exceptionof his agent.
